name: a lovers' escape
description:
After playing a love song for his deceased partner Eurydice, Orpheus is granted passage out of the Underworld with her spirit in tow. But on the way out, the cracks and details of their relationship start to reveal themselves again, and again, and again.

Play as one of the ancient lovers in this short, modern narrative based on the ancient tragedy.

Shoutout to Sarah Ruhl and Anaïs Mitchell, whose theatrical works were inspirations for this little slice of story. And to Nat Mesnard, whose Introduction to Interactive Fiction class is just so dope!
